website_summaries.verdict: Simple scoreboard design that saves you quite a bit of money. However, it has no timing feature or buzzer for alerting officials.
pros: Very inexpensive scoreboard that you can carry and use anywhere
Manual control of the board means anyone can operate it
Red and green numbers against a white background are easy to read from a distance
Folds down small, so you can store it in a small space
cons: Not as handy as an electric board, as it cannot keep time or show extra data like fouls

website_summaries.verdict: Choose this board if you're using for baseball or another sport with 9 innings.
pros: Keeps score to 99 points each for home and guest
Folds up and snaps closed for easy transport
cons: Can flip by itself in the wind

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this if you will be using it outside...numbers are flimsy, and took on water during a light drizzle UNDER a canopy tent. Numbers are cardboard, not plastic as advertised. Ruined after 1 use, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: Limited usefulness
customer_reviews.text: Too small really, and numbers only on ONE side so overall only useful for one group of people on a sideline all within line-of-sight. I'll put up with it because it is already mid-season but will be going to goodwill after that.
customer_reviews.author: davedigerati

customer_reviews.title: Great find and value
customer_reviews.text: This fit the need my team is very thankful we added this to our arsenal. Likes: light, compact, easy to use; cons: cards can tare easy, would prefer “US” vs “THEM” instead of home away, and would like to have # of outs but these are just preferences
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boughton

customer_reviews.title: Good to have!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this for my girls softball games. Only thing is the numbers flip over very easily with just a little bit of wind. But still pleased with the purchase. Update: one year later and this item is still holding up well. Numbers didn’t peel or get ruined due to rain. It’s gotten wet plenty of times but no issue at all. Still annoying the numbers easily flip over due to wind but oh well. Maybe I’ll get the more expensive scoreboard someday.
customer_reviews.author: osomello

customer_reviews.title: smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than you think and you need to constantly turn it around to check the score. Would be better if the score was also reflected on the back so scorekeeper could know what is showing on front.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Professional look and feel with a few very minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The bold numbers are easy enough to see against the white background. The whole set is relatively light and easy to fold up for storage, but mine came with one small metal piece already broken off. Luckily that doesn't affect any functionality. The numbers are easy enough to flip, although the other brands with the flexible cloth-like plastic are a little easier to flip. Overall, these look and feel professional, and for the price I'd definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: they dried out fine though. Overall totally functional and readable
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected; the case/stand part is a bit stiff and fussy but functional. The little handle on the top is a joke. The number cards are cut from laminated stock and will soak up water if it's wet out; they dried out fine though. Overall totally functional and readable, big improvement over keeping score on a whiteboard.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Good value scoreboards
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for our youth wrestling tournament. Numbers are small, but we're able to be seen from the stands.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Rath

customer_reviews.title: Volley Ball Scores
customer_reviews.text: This flip chart scoreboard is easy to use. I like the two colors for the points, as it makes it easier to read. It is durable to easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: There are times that ball fields do not have score boards and this works great
customer_reviews.author: Tonyia Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good baseball score keeper
customer_reviews.text: We use this for baseball. It’s perfect because the middle row can keep the innings. Simple to use and folds up nice and small for transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Stechschulte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a backyard baseball game - worked great
customer_reviews.author: Nemrac

customer_reviews.title: We have three boys and lots of friends that come over and this is a fun way to keep score for all the games they ...
customer_reviews.text: Our children use this everywhere now for all kinds of games. We have three boys and lots of friends that come over and this is a fun way to keep score for all the games they dream up.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: we won every time we used it.
customer_reviews.text: only as good as the operator... haha. great back up score keeper to have on hand. or for a second gym.
customer_reviews.author: The Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: use this for baseball and other parents find very helpful! Only problem is when it is windy. May need to figure out something so they don't flip by themselves in the win. Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte N. King

customer_reviews.title: Best score board I've found
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Especially the way it folds up for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca T leishman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: smaller than I had anticipated. Will be difficult to see across the field.
customer_reviews.author: tiger351w

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Les the job, just smaller and cheaper build than the photo let on.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hallman

customer_reviews.title: Portable and convenient but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and is portable. The numbers are flimsier than I had expected and tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The portability of this is nice and makes it easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Scheidt

customer_reviews.title: great for outdoor play but a little small for sideline ...
customer_reviews.text: got two of these, great for outdoor play but a little small for sideline of indoor, hard to read across the court
customer_reviews.author: James Egbert

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality... numbers fell apart, stuck together, and laminate peeled when it got rained on during our game.. I suggest buying one that has plastic numbers, not laminate..
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to our game nights!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! This was EXACTLY what I was looking for and in the proper colors for our Bocce Ball games .... thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Courtleigh Guerci

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use in the rain. Numbers are not nylon, just laminated paper.
customer_reviews.text: This scoreboard is listed inaccurately. "Nylon numbers" should read "Laminated paper numbers. Product not to be used outdoors in the rain. Numbers will delaminate.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Graff Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scoreboards @ a great price. Thanks! Because of the great price and compact size, our wrestling club was able to buy all of the scoreboards we needed for upcoming tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: We tried to use this as a temporary scoreboard for ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried to use this as a temporary scoreboard for our softball league. It rained for 10 minutes and ruined most of the numbers (the laminate over the numbers bubbled and peeled off)
customer_reviews.author: deebo23

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: This scoreboard doesn't have numbers printed on the flip side so anyone sitting behind the board can't see the score.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio U

customer_reviews.title: It is more flimsy than I expected. You either ...
customer_reviews.text: It is more flimsy than I expected. You either need to attach it to something or put a weight of some kind in it so it don't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Catzie

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a great little score board
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great little score board. My Jr High students are pretty tough on things and this has survived!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look bigger than it is. It is still fairly easy to use for score keeping right beside a court.
customer_reviews.author: William D Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for one sided vewing.
customer_reviews.text: Quality for the money and compact fold up design a real plus. Only disappointment is that it does not show score from both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Numbers are not fully laminated and are ruined when they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Economical Product
customer_reviews.text: Very basic, but exactly what I was looking for the needs that I have for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, however the plastic started to peel away from the corners after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not  bad
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, but does the trick. Nice little scoreboard for casual play/practice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The numbers are made in carton not plastic, not for outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: Very good sturdy and portable. I would probably give it a 5 star that would mean it is perfect like me.
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and works well for the parents at my daughter's soccer game.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product came quickly and worked out amazingly for my basketball tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: The scoreboards worked perfectly as expected and shipping was in time. Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ferguson

product_meta.title: Tachikara Porta-Score Flip Scoreboard
product_meta.description: Tachikara Porta-Score Flip Scoreboard folds up and snaps closed for easy transport. The nylon numbers keep score to 99 and rounds to 9. Measures 17.25" L x 1.75" W x 8" H.
feature_bullets: Convenient, portable scoreboard keeps score to 99
Folds up and snaps closed for easy transport

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
